txt.en: Ereblen can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should bring the Gondorian scrolls to Ereblen.
Gondorian scrolls can be found in Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore.\n\nYou should collect Gondorian scrolls.

'Many writings are to be found within Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore. Perhaps some scrolls of Gondor's past rest within. If you are to venture inside, I ask of you to collect these ancient Gondorian scrolls.'
There is much for the White Company to accomplish in reclaiming Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
'I see that you have success! I will ensure these scrolls are brought back to Minas Tirith at once. Thank you, [placeholder]. You have done Gondor a great service today.'
Halls of Black Lore: Gondorian Scrolls
